author: Konstantin Tsiolkovsky
quote: The Earth is the cradle of humanity, but mankind cannot stay in the cradle forever.

author: Neil Armstrong
quote: That's one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind.

author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quote: The Universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.

author: Peter Diamandis
quote: Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: We are just an advanced breed of monkeys on a minor planet of a very average star. But we can understand the Universe. That makes us something very special.

author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quote: Perhaps we've never been visited by aliens because they have looked up Earth and decided there's no sign of intelligent life.

author: Fred Hoyle
quote: Space isn't remote at all. It's only an hour's drive away if your car could go straight upwards.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: I don't think the human race will survive the next thousand years, unless we spread into space.

author: Valentina Tereshkova
quote: Once you've been in space, you appreciate how small and fragile the Earth is.

author: Simon Conway Morris
quote: It is difficult to imagine evolution in alien planets operating is any manner other than Darwinian.
